## blockRendering.ConstantProvider class

An object that provides constants for rendering blocks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConstantProvider 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ConstantProvider</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createBlockStyle\_(colour)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.createblockstyle_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a block style object based on the given colour. |
|  [createDom(svg, tagName, selector, injectionDivIfIsParent)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.createdom.md) |  | Create any DOM elements that this renderer needs (filters, patterns, etc). |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this constants provider. Delete all DOM elements that this provider created. |
|  [generateSecondaryColour\_(inputColour)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.generatesecondarycolour_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Generate a secondary colour from the passed in primary colour. |
|  [generateTertiaryColour\_(inputColour)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.generatetertiarycolour_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Generate a tertiary colour from the passed in primary colour. |
|  [getBlockStyle(blockStyleName)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.getblockstyle.md) |  | Gets the BlockStyle for the given block style name. |
|  [getBlockStyleForColour(colour)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.getblockstyleforcolour.md) |  | Get or create a block style based on a single colour value. Generate a name for the style based on the colour. |
|  [getCSS\_(selector)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.getcss_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get any renderer specific CSS to inject when the renderer is initialized. |
|  [init()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.init.md) |  | Initialize shape objects based on the constants set in the constructor. |
|  [injectCSS\_(tagName, selector)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.injectcss_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Inject renderer specific CSS into the page. |
|  [makeInsideCorners()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makeinsidecorners.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [makeJaggedTeeth()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makejaggedteeth.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [makeNotch()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makenotch.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [makeOutsideCorners()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makeoutsidecorners.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [makePuzzleTab()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makepuzzletab.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [makeStartHat()](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.makestarthat.md) | <code>protected</code> |  |
|  [setComponentConstants\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.setcomponentconstants_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Set constants from a theme's component styles. |
|  [setDynamicProperties\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.setdynamicproperties_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Sets dynamic properties that depend on other values or theme properties. |
|  [setFontConstants\_(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.setfontconstants_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Set constants related to fonts. |
|  [setTheme(theme)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.settheme.md) |  | Refresh constants properties that depend on the theme. |
|  [shapeFor(connection)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.shapefor.md) |  | Get an object with connection shape and sizing information based on the type of the connection. |
|  [validatedBlockStyle\_(blockStyle)](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.validatedblockstyle_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Get a full block style object based on the input style object. Populate any missing values. |
